ayah: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
ayah_translit: inna anzalnahu fi laylati al-qadri
ayah_english: Indeed We revealed it in (the) Night (of) Power

ayah: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
ayah_translit: inna anzalnahu fi laylati al-qadri
ayah_english: Indeed We revealed it in (the) Night (of) Power

ayah: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
ayah_translit: inna anzalnahu fi laylati al-qadri
ayah_english: Indeed We revealed it in (the) Night (of) Power

ayah: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
ayah_translit: inna anzalnahu fi laylati al-qadri
ayah_english: Indeed We revealed it in (the) Night (of) Power

ayah: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
ayah_translit: inna anzalnahu fi laylati al-qadri
ayah_english: Indeed We revealed it in (the) Night (of) Power

ayah: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
ayah_translit: wama adraka ma laylatu al-qadri
ayah_english: And what can make you know what (the) Night (of) Power (is)

ayah: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
ayah_translit: wama adraka ma laylatu al-qadri
ayah_english: And what can make you know what (the) Night (of) Power (is)

ayah: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
ayah_translit: wama adraka ma laylatu al-qadri
ayah_english: And what can make you know what (the) Night (of) Power (is)

ayah: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
ayah_translit: wama adraka ma laylatu al-qadri
ayah_english: And what can make you know what (the) Night (of) Power (is)

ayah: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
ayah_translit: wama adraka ma laylatu al-qadri
ayah_english: And what can make you know what (the) Night (of) Power (is)

ayah: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
ayah_translit: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
ayah_english: (The) Night (of) Power (is) better than a thousand month(s)

ayah: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
ayah_translit: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
ayah_english: (The) Night (of) Power (is) better than a thousand month(s)

ayah_translit: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
ayah_english: (The) Night (of) Power (is) better than a thousand month(s)

ayah: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
ayah_translit: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
ayah_english: (The) Night (of) Power (is) better than a thousand month(s)

ayah_translit: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
ayah_english: (The) Night (of) Power (is) better than a thousand month(s)

ayah: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
ayah_translit: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
ayah_english: (The) Night (of) Power (is) better than a thousand month(s)

ayah: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ
ayah_translit: tanazzalu al-malaikatu wal-ruhu fiha bi-idh'ni rabbihim min kulli amrin
ayah_english: Descend the Angels and the Spirit therein by (the) permission (of) their Lord for every affair

ayah: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ

ayah: سَلَٰمٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطۡلَعِ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ
ayah_translit: salamun hiya hatta matla'i al-fajri
ayah_english: Peace it (is) until (the) emergence (of) the dawn

ayah: سَلَٰمٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطۡلَعِ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ
